title: Java Developer Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at WDC (Gurgaon, Haryana) in May 2013
Interview Descriptions: F2F for Technical interview Question . Ask from Core level to End level (Core java, J2ee, hibernate,Struts, Spring Framework). So well prepare yourself . They will take interview using Panels.
Interview Questions: why did you leave your previous company

title: Senior Principal Engineer Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at WDC (San Jose, CA) in May 2012
Interview Descriptions: Full day of interviews. Detailed questions about past experiences

title: Principal Engineer Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at WDC (San Jose, CA) in May 2011
Interview Descriptions: First HR people called me and discussed the opening that I submitted for.  Then on-site interview was scheduled. It was an all day interview with all people (about 8) in the department plus two directors. After that, I wrote "thank you" letters to the hiring manger and two directors immediately. Waiting for about two weeks, HR called me again and discussed the salary package and I accepted the offer.
Interview Questions: Why do you select our company?

title: Program Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at WDC in May 2010
Interview Questions: What is the achievement that you are most proud of?

title: Administrative/Project Assistant Interview
Application Type: The process took 1 day. I interviewed at WDC in Aug 2009
Interview Descriptions: I applied two months prior, got a phone call to come in for an interview.  Had the interview with two individuals, then got a call back for a second interview.  Interviewed with the CEO and received a call the next day that I was chosen for the position.
Interview Questions: What would you bring to a potluck.
